entry.title: Heyoka
entry.summary:
Author: hikyuu

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,047Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Stiles is struck by lightning then some weird things happen. He remembered the lightning game he and Scott used to play as kids, counting the seconds between lightning and thunder to estimate the storm's proximity. By his calculations, the storm was directly overhead—thunder following lightning by less than a second. By their childish logic, the eye of the storm was less than a mile away. Stiles runs faster. He was nearing Derek’s house when it happened. The hairs on his arms stood on end, his ears buzzed, and his fingertips tingled. He had read and watched enough of “I Shouldn’t Be Alive” to know exactly what this meant. What he didn’t know was what he should do. Should he stop? Run? Take cover? Did lightning follow movement? Should he drop to the ground? Roll? He kept running. Derek’s house was just ahead. If he could make it— A deafening boom rang out, and Stiles’ vision went white. Pain engulfed him, as though his body were ablaze.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,736Chapters: 14/40Kudos: 143

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Redlight
entry.summary:
Author: mossriddened

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,640Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 63

Summary: Stiles saw the red light, staring ahead as it passed overhead -- and kept going. He didn’t even stop.He didn’t even flinch.It felt almost as if he wasn’t truly present in the driver’s seat, instead being somewhere behind the wheel, watching through the windshield as if it were nothing more than a screen. He felt floaty, entirely detached.He barely registered the speedometer as it climbed, streetlights streaking into lines in his window. He barely registered when red and blue lights joined in the mix behind him, almost blinding in the rearview mirrors as colors blended together.It was just lights.–––––––––or . .Stiles Stilinski gets put on house arrest for his own safety after breaking several traffic violations and running from the police. Although he can no longer drive away from his problems, he finds them, instead, in his reflection.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,181Chapters: 17/38Kudos: 24

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

They took down Gerard after all his wrongdoings, and now Derek is looking at strengthening his pack.But things are changing faster than he can control. He knows, now, that he has a chance with Stiles having come out to him, but does that mean that the other boys wants him? Author: Azraphels

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,059Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 22

Summary: If Liam had been asked again to choose between getting in the car with Theo and leaving with him, or staying in Beacon Hills to protect it from the new threat, he would definitely have said "Yes.""Yes" to killing Theo at the exact moment when Liam's summary sentence, "So, some crazy person's notes ended up in the hands of another crazy person who is now looking for a gri-something that does ultra-crazy things?" would be answered with "Well, yes, that's the summary."If Mason were asked, he would say that besides the ghouls who wanted to eat him, the possessed nuns who wanted to kidnap Liam, his own kidnapping, seeing Nolan as a human sacrifice by a tribe, losing Corey in the Appalachian Mountains, and watching that crazy psychopath almost rip Theo's arm off, he would definitely do it all again!𝐎𝐑 ｡ ｡ ｡ The gang ends up taking a trip across the United States to try to stop Monroe's plans!

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,564Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 78

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

Author: the_jaspierre

Summary: Stiles is turned into a vampire.He hates himself and everything he's become as he struggles to overcome his lust for blood. What he didn't anticipate is having to deal with his feelings towards Derek.But doing all of that is pretty hard when he's living in Derek's loft, under house arrest.

entry.title: Wuther My Heights, Mr. Hale
entry.summary:
Author: Waddiwasii

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,020Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: Stiles works at a bookstore.Derek owns the building.They meet on a Tuesday.By Sunday, he’s moving into Derek’s spare room.It’s not meant to be anything at all.But turns out to be everything he ever wanted.And now Derek doesn’t know how he could ever possibly let him go.It starts with Wuthering Heights and ends with Stiles in Derek’s bed. Somewhere in between, there’s an eviction notice, a spare room, and the terrifying possibility of being loved back.Oh, and a one-eyed cat.And sex.There’s also sex.
